name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Cavity modes

3. Nonlinear optics
schedule:

Gaussian beams (1 week)
Hermite-Gaussian (HG) beams (1 week)

Midterm exam (1 week)

Final exam (1 week)
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
